m00.description: The value of the first row and the first column.

m01.description: The value of the first row and the second column.

m02.description: The value of the first row and the third column.

m03.description: The value of the first row and the fourth column.

m10.description: The value of the second row and the first column. It describes the x part of a translation of the origin.

m11.description: The value of the second row and the second column.

m12.description: The value of the second row and the third column.

m13.description: The value of the second row and the fourth column. It describes the y part of a translation of the origin.

m20.description: The value of the third row and the first column.

m21.description: The value of the third row and the second column.

m22.description: The value of the third row and the third column.

m23.description: The value of the third row and the fourth column. It describes the z part of a translation of the origin.

m30.description: The value of the fourth row and the first column.

m31.description: The value of the fourth row and the second column. It describes the x part of possible perspective distortion. Default is usually 0.

m32.description: The value of the fourth row and the third column. It describes the y part of possible perspective distortion. Default is usually 0.

m33.description: The value of the fourth row and the fourth column. This should always be 1.

Transform.title: Transform
Transform.description: A transform is a 4x4 matrix that is used to describe transformations of objects in 3d space. The transform is in row dominant form.
